caption: STANDARDIZED CET1 RATIO (%)
trend_summary: The Standardized CET1 Ratio increased from 15.0% in 1Q24 to 15.3% in 2Q24. This was primarily driven by a 104 bps increase from Net Income and a 32 bps impact from Visa shares, partially offset by Capital Distributions (-48 bps) and RWA (-27 bps).

caption: STANDARDIZED RISK-WEIGHTED ASSETS ($B)
trend_summary: Standardized Risk-Weighted Assets rose from $1,712B in 1Q24 to $1,743B in 2Q24, an increase of $31B. This was driven by increases in Lending (+$12B), Market Risk (+$6B), and Credit Risk ex. Lending (+$12B).
